meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the skin.
meanings.sent1: The intradermal injection was given just under the skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor administered the intradermal vaccine with a small needle.
meanings.sent3: The intradermal patch made the superhero's skin glow.
meanings.sent4: Her intradermal knowledge of skincare products was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The intradermal treatment left a faint mark on her arm.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the layer of skin beneath the epidermis.
meanings.sent1: The intradermal tissue is delicate and sensitive.
meanings.sent2: The nurse carefully examined the intradermal layer during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The intradermal secret agent had hidden gadgets under his skin.
meanings.sent4: Her intradermal emotions were visible through her expressions.
meanings.sent5: The intradermal connection between twins was remarkable.
